TunableEnum.name: format_type
TunableEnum.description: Type of entry this notification will look like no the UI. - Expandable data corresponds to rows of data that expands into subitems. For example: Scientist serums will have an expandable option to display the ingredients for the serums. - Numbered data corresponds to a list of items to be numbered as they become available. For example: Detective notes get displayed a a numbered list. - Icon description data corresponds at an entry of an icon with some text describing it. For example detective evidence.

TunableVariant.name: is_sortable
TunableVariant.description: If enabled, entries of subcategory will be presented sorted alphabetically.

Tunable.name: include_new_entry
Tunable.description: If checked, the entries that has new entry tag will be sorted.

TunableVariant.name: show_max_entries
TunableVariant.description: If this is tuned, UI will use this value to display the amount of missing entries for a subcategory. For example if we tune this value to 3 and we unlock a notebook entry UI will display the data for the one entry that was unlocked but will display an empty UI field showing the player its missing two more.
